channel.title: Cache Auto download problem
channel.description:
:( :(
So everyone but me is having problems with my client. In CacheDownloader.java i have put this as direct download to my cache
http://download171.mediafire.com/ucsee4s2zkbg/b434a3osn7s7e3g/cache.zip
It works downloading the cache for me. But for everyone else they get error messages that say they cant find "C:/Erasedpkzcache1/Maps/mapConfig.txt" my client finds it but not theirs. It tries to download the cache for like 2 seconds but then it says error please report and that message about the mapconfig.txt comes up in the debug. I think the issue is that it tries to find mapConfig.txt before the cache is downloaded, but why for everyone else and not me? My cachedownloader.java: http://morot4.webs.com/Webclient/CacheDownloader.java webclient: http://morot4.webs.com/Webclient/webclient.html
whats wrong with my client? i dont get it??

item.title: Cache Auto download problem
item.dc:creator: @morot4 morot4
item.description:
@morot4 wrote:

So everyone but me is having problems with my client.
In CacheDownloader.java i have put this as direct download to my cache

http://download171.mediafire.com/ucsee4s2zkbg/b434a3osn7s7e3g/cache.zip

It works downloading the cache for me. But for everyone else they get error messages that say they cant find “C:/Erasedpkzcache1/Maps/mapConfig.txt” my client finds it but not theirs. It tries to download the cache for like 2 seconds but then it says error please report and that message about the mapconfig.txt comes up in the debug. I think the issue is that it tries to find mapConfig.txt before the cache is downloaded, but why for everyone else and not me? My cachedownloader.java: http://morot4.webs.com/Webclient/CacheDownloader.java
webclient:
http://morot4.webs.com/Webclient/webclient.html

whats wrong with my client?
i dont get it??
